## Install
1. Open the **Bubble Plugin Marketplace**.
2. Search for **Nebulang App Translator**.
3. Click **Install**.

![Marketplace Screenshot](https://via.placeholder.com/600x300?text=Bubble+Plugin+Marketplace)

### Example
After installation, the plugin will appear in your Bubble editor under the Plugins tab.

### Fields
- **Icon Mode**: Choose between displaying country flags, a custom icon, or none.
- **Custom Icon**: Specify a Material Icon or Unicode emoji.
- **Dropdown Color**: Set the background color of the dropdown.

![Icon Mode Example](https://via.placeholder.com/600x300?text=Icon+Mode+Example)

### Example
Set the dropdown color to `#FF5733` for a vibrant look.

### Fields
- **Show Scrollbar**: Toggle the scrollbar visibility.
- **Show Dropdown Arrow**: Show or hide the dropdown arrow.

![Display Options Example](https://via.placeholder.com/600x300?text=Display+Options)

### Example
Enable the search bar to allow users to quickly find their desired language.

### Fields
- **Icon/Flag Gap**: Adjust the gap between the icon/flag and text.
- **Content Alignment**: Align content within the button.

![Padding Example](https://via.placeholder.com/600x300?text=Padding+and+Alignment)

### Example
Set the padding to `10px` on all sides for a balanced layout.

### Fields
- **List Height**: Define the maximum height of the dropdown list.
- **List Margin**: Set the margin between the dropdown list and the button.

![List Settings Example](https://via.placeholder.com/600x300?text=List+Settings)

### Example
Set the list height to `200px` for better visibility of options.

### Fields
- **Translate Page Title**: Choose whether to translate the browser tab title.
- **Initial Language**: Set the default language (e.g., 'auto', 'original', or a specific language code).

![Translation Options Example](https://via.placeholder.com/600x300?text=Translation+Options)

### Example
Set the initial language to `en` for English as the default.

### language_changed
Triggered when the selected language changes.

![Event Example](https://via.placeholder.com/600x300?text=Event+Triggered)

### Example
Use this event to log the selected language in your app's database.

### selected_language
Reflects the currently selected language.

![State Example](https://via.placeholder.com/600x300?text=Selected+Language)

### Example
Display the selected language in the app's header.

### Instructions
Add 'no-translate' to the 'ID Attribute' field in the element customization panel to prevent translation.

![Prevent Translation Example](https://via.placeholder.com/600x300?text=No+Translate)

### Example
Use this feature to exclude sensitive data from being translated.

### Tips
Use Bubble's default style settings to customize the widget's background color, including gradients and images.

![Custom Appearance Example](https://via.placeholder.com/600x300?text=Custom+Appearance)

### Example
Apply a gradient background for a modern look.
